filtering_steps: Removed rows with null or zero credit_limit and null customer_bucket - New shape: (76053, 24)
Filtered for UnBanked customers and removed special programmes and ranks 3 & 4 - New shape: (50421, 24)
Handled invalid ages - Ages capped to range [18, 100]
Handled extreme income delta percentages - Capped to range [-100, 500]
Handled due_principal vs credit_limit - Capped due_principal to credit_limit where necessary
Imputed missing numerical values with median
Removed outliers from specified numerical columns using 3 standard deviations rule
cleaning_summary:
Final dataset shape: (50091, 8)
Records removed during cleaning: 377025
Data quality improvement completed!
